columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.desc: Indicates the payment amount in the payment currency.

columns.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.desc: Deprecated; was used to store the bank account identifier.

columns.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME
columns.desc: Name of the bank account from which the payment is made.

columns.name: CHECK_DATE
columns.desc: Date when the payment was issued.

columns.name: CHECK_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; unique internal identifier for the check/payment record.

columns.name: CHECK_NUMBER
columns.desc: Payment/check number assigned to the transaction.

columns.name: CURRENCY_CODE
columns.desc: Currency code of the payment (e.g., USD, EUR).

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Payment method (e.g., CHECK, EFT, WIRE).

columns.name: PAYMENT_TYPE_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates the payment type: Quick, Manual, Refund, etc.

columns.name: CHECKRUN_NAME
columns.desc: Payment Process Request name (batch name) in Payment Manager.

columns.name: CHECK_FORMAT_ID
columns.desc: Payment format ID attached to the payment document.

columns.name: CHECK_STOCK_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for the check stock/document template.

columns.name: CREATED_BY
columns.desc: WHO column; user ID of the person who created the record (FK to FND_USER).

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.desc: WHO column; date when this row was created.

columns.name: STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Status of the payment: Negotiable, Cleared, Spoiled, etc.

columns.name: VENDOR_NAME
columns.desc: Name of the supplier receiving the payment.

columns.name: VENDOR_SITE_CODE
columns.desc: Code of the supplier site associated with the payment.

columns.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_NUM
columns.desc: Supplier's bank account number for electronic payments.

columns.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE
columns.desc: Type of the supplier's bank account (e.g., Savings, Checking).

columns.name: BANK_NUM
columns.desc: Supplier's bank number (used in EFT/ACH).

columns.name: CHECK_VOUCHER_NUM
columns.desc: Deprecated; no longer used.

columns.name: CLEARED_AMOUNT
columns.desc: Amount cleared by the bank as of the cleared date.

columns.name: CLEARED_DATE
columns.desc: Date the payment was cleared by the bank.

columns.name: ORG_ID
columns.desc: Operating unit identifier; supports Multi-Org structure.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIERS; supplier unique identifier.

columns.name: VENDOR_SITE_ID
columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL; supplier site identifier.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE
columns.desc: Exchange rate for foreign currency payments.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_DATE
columns.desc: Date when the exchange rate is effective.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE
columns.desc: Type of exchange rate (e.g., Spot, Corporate).

columns.name: BASE_AMOUNT
columns.desc: Payment amount in the functional (ledger) currency.

columns.name: CHECKRUN_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the payment process request (batch).

columns.name: REQUEST_ID
columns.desc: WHO column; concurrent request ID of the last program that updated the record.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.desc: FK to IBY_EXT_BANK_ACCOUNTS; supplier's external bank account.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.desc: Free-text description of the payment.

columns.name: ACTUAL_VALUE_DATE
columns.desc: Actual value date; used by Cash Management.

columns.name: ANTICIPATED_VALUE_DATE
columns.desc: Anticipated value date; used by Cash Management.

columns.name: RELEASED_DATE
columns.desc: Date/time when a stop payment was released.

columns.name: STOPPED_DATE
columns.desc: Date/time when a stop payment was recorded.

columns.name: CE_BANK_ACCT_USE_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for bank account usage assigned by Cash Management.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE
columns.desc: Unique identifier of the payment method selected.

columns.name: PARTY_ID
columns.desc: Party identifier for the supplier (Trading Community Architecture).

columns.name: PARTY_SITE_ID
columns.desc: Party site identifier for the supplier (Trading Community Architecture).

columns.name: PAYMENT_PROFILE_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the Payment Process Profile (Oracle Payments).

columns.name: PAYMENT_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.desc: Identifier of the payment document used (check stock, template, etc.).

columns.name: COMPLETED_PMTS_GROUP_ID
columns.desc: Unique ID for completed payments (Oracle Payments).

columns.name: PAYMENT_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the payment in Oracle Payments.

columns.name: PAYMENT_INSTRUCTION_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the payment instruction in Oracle Payments.

columns.name: REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_NAME
columns.desc: Name of the supplier to whom the invoice amount will be remitted.

columns.name: REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier of the supplier to whom the invoice is remitted.

columns.name: REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_SITE
columns.desc: Name of the supplier site to whom the invoice amount will be remitted.

columns.name: REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_SITE_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier of the supplier site to whom the invoice amount will be remitted.

key_columns.name: VENDOR_ID
key_columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIERS; supplier unique identifier.

key_columns.name: VENDOR_NAME
key_columns.desc: Name of the supplier receiving the payment.

key_columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL; supplier site identifier.

key_columns.desc: Operating unit identifier; supports Multi-Org structure.

key_columns.desc: WHO column; date when this row was created.

key_columns.desc: WHO column; user ID of the person who created the record (FK to FND_USER).
